text: Epafras uaghan ia gɨnɨghnɨgha ghaze, Afeziam ia ko ikɨ. A uaghan ian mav, egha Krais Iesusɨn ingangarir gumazim. A zurara ia bagha pamten God ko mɨgɨavɨra iti, egha ghaze, God ian akurvaghtɨ, ia tuivigh gavgavigh, egh fofozir aghuitam oteveghan koghɨva, egh Godɨn ifongiam bar a gɨfoghɨva an gɨn mangam.
